<js>
json=[];
listStr = bDe(baseUrl);
list=listStr.split('\n');
for(i = 0;i<list.length;i++){
	let index =/ã€(.*?)ã€‘/.test(list[i])?list[i].match(/ã€(.*?)ã€‘/)[1]:"";
	let src = /@(.*?)@/.test(list[i])?list[i].match(/@(.*?)@/)[1]:"";
	let text = /ã€Š(.*?)ã€‹/.test(list[i])?list[i].match(/ã€Š(.*?)ã€‹/)[1]:"";
	let intro = /ã€(.*?)ã€/.test(list[i])?list[i].match(/ã€(.*?)ã€/)[1]:"";	json.push({index:index,src:src,text:text,intro:intro})
	}
JSON.stringify(json)</js>
